sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of home follow-up to the quality of life of primiparas during puerperium.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical characteristic of puerperal mental disorder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨产褥期首发精神障碍临床特点。

definition: woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
to convalesce for a month following childbirth, following a special diet, and observing various taboos to protect the body from exposure to the "wind"
